definition: To move about and feed on vegetation, typically referring to the behavior of certain animals.

examples.german: Die Kühe grasen auf der Wiese.
examples.english: The cows graze in the meadow.

examples.german: Die Schafe grasen friedlich auf dem Hügel.
examples.english: The sheep graze peacefully on the hill.
The horses graze in the stable.

examples.german: Die Ziegen grasen gerne an steilen Hängen.
examples.english: The goats like to graze on steep slopes.
The rabbits graze in the garden.
